message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, I believe it would be beneficial for both of us if you were to acquire it at a special introductory price of $9,500.
Hello Alice, thanks for the offer! The product looks great, but I was hoping to spend a bit less. Would you be willing to come down to $8,000?
Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. Considering your feedback, I am willing to negotiate further. I propose we finalize the transaction at $8,500.
Alice, I appreciate you working with me on the price. How about we split the difference and settle at $8,250?
